Emotional Regulation.definition: Ability to stay grounded when emotionally activated.

anchors.7: Used a ritual or paused to self-regulate
anchors.10: Stayed emotionally steady throughout the day

Flood Recovery.definition: How effectively you reset after flooding (if it occurred).

anchors.3: Remained flooded most of the day
anchors.5: Used partial reset with some success
anchors.7: Used reset ritual and rebalanced quickly

Shame Complex.definition: Level of internalized shame that colored your self-perception.

anchors.3: Subtle shame shifted behavior or tone
anchors.7: Noted and avoided the shame pattern

Self-Assurance.definition: Confidence in your values and internal compass.

Task Balancing.definition: Ability to switch between tasks fluidly and prioritize effectively.

anchors.1: Stuck or paralyzed in one mode

Forgetfulness.definition: Memory and follow-through for commitments and cues.

anchors.5: Some slips, used cues to recover

Mindfulness.definition: Level of present-moment awareness and non-reactivity.

Intimacy.definition: Emotional or physical closeness, especially with Gabby.

Affection.definition: Verbal or nonverbal expressions of love or warmth.

anchors.10: Frequent, mutual, or deeply felt affection

Appreciation.definition: Acknowledgment and gratitude given or received.

anchors.10: Specific, emotional appreciation offered and/or received

Meaningful Connection.definition: Presence of any emotionally rich moment today.

Sleep.definition: Quality and depth of sleep last night.

Sleep Hygiene.definition: Did you follow your bedtime ritual (tea, melatonin, no screens or emotional convos after 10 PM)?

Digestion.definition: Comfort, regularity, and gut symptoms today.

Physical Activity.definition: Intensity and intention behind today’s movement.

Meditation.definition: Did you practice a mindful pause today?

Supplements.definition: Did you take your AM/PM supplements (for you and Gabby)?

Content Consumed.definition: Did you engage with emotionally or intellectually enriching content?

Emotional Learnings.definition: Did you reflect on your emotional growth or internal narrative today?

Relationship Learnings.definition: Did you notice any insight in your relationships?
